Description: This corpus contains articles from various English newspapers (mainly newspapers from London) from the 17th and 18th century.
This corpus contains articles from various German newspapers from 2011.#SEPThe corpus is available through a dedicated concordancer.
This corpus contains articles from the Italian newspaper L’Adige from 1999 to 2006.#SEPThe corpus is available for download through META-SHARE.
The corpus contains articles from the Italian newspaper La Repubblica.#SEPThe corpus is available through a dedicated concordancer.

Annotation: entities, events, event factuality, temporal information, semantic roles, and intra-document and cross-document event and entity coreference
Description: This corpus contains Italian translations of 120 English Wikinews articles.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from a dedicated website.

Corpus: Corpus of Contemporary Serbian Newspapers and Magazines
Description: This corpus contains articles from over a 100 Serbian newspapers from 2004 to 2012.
